00023 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00024 {
00025     struct Device *hd;
00026     struct Volume *vol;
00027     struct File *file;
00028     unsigned char buf[600];
00029     long n;
00030     FILE *out;
00031     long len;
00032     struct List *list;
00033  
00034     adfEnvInitDefault();
00035 
00036 //  adfSetEnvFct(0,0,MyVer,0);
00037 
00038     /* mount existing device : FFS */
00039     hd = adfMountDev( "hd.adf",FALSE );
00040     if (!hd) {
00041         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount device\n");
00042         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00043     }
00044     adfDeviceInfo(hd);
00045 
00046     vol = adfMount(hd, 1, FALSE);
00047     if (!vol) {
00048         adfUnMountDev(hd);
00049         fprintf(stderr, "can't mount volume\n");
00050         adfEnvCleanUp(); exit(1);
00051     }
00052 
00053     adfVolumeInfo(vol);
00054 
00055 
00056     /* write one file */
00057     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "moon_gif","w");
00058     if (!file) return 1;
00059     out = fopen("Check/MOON.GIF","rb");
00060     if (!out) return 1;
00061     
00062     len = 600;
00063     n = fread(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),len,out);
00064     while(!feof(out)) {
00065         adfWriteFile(file, n, buf);
00066         n = fread(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),len,out);
00067     }
00068     if (n>0)
00069         adfWriteFile(file, n, buf);
00070 
00071     fclose(out);
00072 
00073     adfCloseFile(file);
00074 
00075     /* the directory */
00076 /*    list = adfGetDirEnt(vol,vol->curDirPtr);
00077     while(list) {
00078         printEntry(list->content);
00079         adfFreeEntry(list->content);
00080         list = list->next;
00081     }
00082     freeList(list);
00083 */
00084 
00085     /* re read this file */
00086     file = adfOpenFile(vol, "moon_gif","r");
00087     if (!file) return 1;
00088     out = fopen("moon__gif","wb");
00089     if (!out) return 1;
00090 
00091     len = 300;
00092     n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00093     while(!adfEndOfFile(file)) {
00094         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00095         n = adfReadFile(file, len, buf);
00096     }
00097     if (n>0)
00098         fwrite(buf,sizeof(unsigned char),n,out);
00099 
00100     fclose(out);
00101 
00102     adfCloseFile(file);
00103 
00104     adfUnMount(vol);
00105     adfUnMountDev(hd);
00106 
00107 
00108     adfEnvCleanUp();
00109 
00110     return 0;
00111 }
